column1: # This file contains localisation strings required for the custom_localisation code
#      which provides a detailed breakdown of the magicka regen calculation
# These strings are eventually concatenated, so always include a "\n" at the start.
# Base Value: It's all stored in character variables, so it's easily accessed

column2:
Base Magicka Regeneration Rate:
 - From Learning: §Y[Root.magicka_regen_rate_from_learning.GetValue]§!
 - From Artifacts: §Y[Root.magicka_regen_rate_from_artifacts.GetValue]§!
 - From Potions: §Y[Root.magicka_regen_rate_from_potions.GetValue]§!
Total: §Y[Root.magicka_regen_rate_base.GetValue]§!

column1: #  --- Show missing good effects (unless they are super-rare)

column2: \n(§RX§!) §YRing of the Erudite§! is equipped §g(potential multiplier: 1.250)§!
\n(§RX§!) Has imbibed §YPotion of Magicka Regeneration§! §g(potential multiplier: 1.250)§!
\n(§G*§!) Is §YNovice Mage§!: §G1.053§! §g(improved education increases this value)§!
\n(§G*§!) Is §YJourneyman Mage§!: §G1.111§! §g(improved education increases this value)§!!
\n(§G*§!) Is §YExperienced Mage§!: §G1.176§! §g(improved education increases this value)§!
\n(§G*§!) Is §YMaster Mage§!: §G1.250§! §g(improved education increases this value)§!
\n(§RX§!) Is a §YMage§! §g(better education gives a larger modifier)§!
\n(§G*§!) Has a §YTier-1 Spellcaster Specialism§!: §G1.053§! §g(higher tier increases this value)§!
\n(§G*§!) Has a §YTier-2 Spellcaster Specialism§!: §G1.111§! §g(higher tier increases this value)§!
\n(§RX§!) Has a §YSpellcaster Specialism§! §g(higher tier gives a larger modifier)§!

column1: #  --- Show only those bad effects that are actually present

column2: \n§g(Figures in §Yyellow§g are taken from the actual calculation and should always be correct. Figures in any other colour are hardcoded for the purpose of this tooltip - please inform the §YED:PRT§g developer (NOT the developer of the main mod) if there appear to be any inconsistencies.)§!
\n(§RX§!) Has imbibed §YPotion of Fortify Magicka§! §g(potential value: 20)§!
\n(§G*§!) §YFork of Horripilation§! is equipped: §RMaximum Magicka is halved!§!
